name: Rei Taro

Proven ability to implement Cloud Security Posture Management (CSPM) and run security information and event management (SIEM) systems. Recognized for delivering innovative solutions in high-stakes environments with a strong emphasis on customer relations and project management, demonstrated through successful projects at leading organizations including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.
